item.title: Programming : Introduction to Programming
item.description: Programs What Is The Program? The meaning of the program is hardware-specific executable text. If examine the working of a program with an example: When run a program with .exe(that is .exe on win OS(Operation System)) extension or another a program extension in any operation system, this program sends certain commands to the systems processor and program works. (This steps for the same systems like computers, tablets, smartphones, etc.) These stages means are programming.
